So you always wanted to use @hadleywickham's #tidyr with @ApacheSpark in #rstats, right? Well, with #sparklyr 1.4, now you can!

This release also enables #GPU accelerated data frames in Spark with @rapidsai and many other improvements: https://t.co/REJs1Eq8yH https://t.co/jcjfBqsZ6h

I've had an amazing #rstats & #datascience workshop with Dr. @allison_horst to kick of the PhD experience. Biggest take-aways: 1. Build reproducibility in every aspect of your workflow. 2. #Coding is for everyone, not just the privileged few. Share and help others learn.
